div.head: ¶The Approbation of JOHN VIRINGUS, Doctour of Physick and Professour.
div.p:
THe Hygiasticon of the Reverend Father Leonard Lessius, a Divine of the Societie of Jesus, is learned, pious, and profitable. For it is squared out according to the Physicians rules, and is entire 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . It whets the vigour of the minde, and leads to old age. Out of his love to the Commonwealth and publick good, he was desirous to make that common, which he had learned
